qas.question: Where have Nanjing's after-hours activities typically been located?

answers.text: around Nanjing Fuzimiao (Confucius Temple) area along the Qinhuai River

qas.question: What three things were popular in the Nanjing Fuzimiao area?
What was a major night attraction for Nanjing?

answers.text: Boating at night in the river

qas.question: What statues are near the ones of teachers and educators?
What is another name for Nanjing Fuzimiao?

context: Traditionally Nanjing's nightlife was mostly centered <a0_0>around Nanjing Fuzimiao (<a4_0>Confucius Temple<a4_0/>) area along the Qinhuai River<a0_0/>, where <a1_0>night markets, restaurants and pubs<a1_0/> thrived. <a2_0>Boating at night in the river<a2_0/> was a main attraction of the city. Thus, one can see the statues of the famous teachers and educators of the past not too far from those of the <a3_0>courtesans<a3_0/> who educated the young men in the other arts.
